immediate_actions: Clean with diluted chlorhexidine or saline

seek_medical_attention.timeframe: If deep, gaping, or signs of infection (redness, swelling, pus)

full_protocol_text: Cat scratch wound: Clean with diluted chlorhexidine. Pat dry. Monitor closely - cat scratches can abscess easily. E-collar if over-licking. See vet if deep, swelling, or pus develops.
